text: 4, also known as Foreigner 4 is a 1981 studio album by English American band Foreigner and was released on 3 July, 1981 through Atlantic Records. It went to number 1 in the United States, number 5 in the United Kingdom, number 2 in Canada and number 3 in Australia. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:1981 albums Category:Foreigner (band) albums
title: 4 (Foreigner album)
